channel.title: Hiring a full time coder!
channel.description:
Need someone to help add some shops, and N.P.C.'s to a Trip Scape Dodian Source. If you can help, please email me at the one below....
Ruinscape@live.com[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2007, 07:18:46 PM[/size][hr]Does anyone want to help? I am offering a staff position, and full rights.

item.title: Hiring a full time coder!
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

“Hiring full time coder!”

Here are your mistakes:

  1. “Hiring”: You are not hiring. Are you paying the person? No.
  2. “full time”: This implys approx. 9am-5pm, 5 days per week. I doubt anyone would accept this for no gain.
  3. “coder”: It’s programmer, faggot.

Summary: You completely fail. Gtfo.

Read full topic

and wtf is up with dodian? whats so freaking good about it?
